name: E.T. End Credits _ Piano Music _ v1.0
name_original: E.T. End Credits _ Piano Music _ v1.0
description:
****** E.T. END CREDITS PIANO PLAYER ******

I really loved this piece of piano piece from when I first heard it as a child - It's the end credits from E.T. I'd love to be able to play it on the piano myself, but not being good enough I instead transcribed the sheet music into this new Scratch Project.

The built in Scratch piano didn't quite sound good enough, so I've imported the samples from a free piano virtual instrument (The SGPN sound-font). This involved mapping each of the 20 sound samples onto a selection of 3 to 5 possible piano notes. The results are pretty good :)

The treble clef and bass clefs each have their notes encoded in a list on their respective sprites. I typed them in my hand reading from the piano score, and they are in the format:
